description: This file defines the main page component for a notes application built with Qwik framework. It manages state such as notes, search term, selected note, and editing/creating modes. It renders various child components like Sidebar, NotesList, NoteEditor, and NoteViewer, and handles user interactions such as searching, selecting, creating, editing, and deleting notes.

methods.name: loadNotes
methods.description: Loads notes from NotesService, either all or filtered by search term.

methods.name: selectNote
methods.description: Sets the selected note ID and resets editing/creating flags.

methods.name: handleDelete
methods.description: Deletes a note after user confirmation and reloads notes.

methods.name: handleSearch
methods.description: Updates search term and reloads notes based on search.

methods.name: handleSave
methods.description: Saves a new or existing note based on current mode, then reloads notes.

methods.name: handleEdit
methods.description: Enables editing mode for the selected note.
